relevant_recom_1: If the tree show signs of decay it should be cut and replaced. If the trees are infested with other pests please control affected trees immediately (for stem borers- block open ways with sticks or other means, control moss with fungicides etc)
relevant_recom_tip_1: Use consentrated salt to reduce your cost on moss control,reduce canopy to reduce pest infestation and associated cost
relevant_recom_2: Prune cocoa trees to have one stem and 3-4 branches. Remove apex branches to reduce tree height
relevant_recom_tip_2: Pruning should be done on a regualar basis to control canopy and cost.Use family labour to reduce cost
relevant_recom_3: If the pests and diseases can be observed on more than 60 trees per acre, please apply recommended chemicals. If the pests and diseases observed is on less than 60 trees per acre, please use recommended intensification of cultural practices on the farm (t
relevant_recom_tip_3: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_4: Spread non-diseased cocoa husks evenly on the farm to mulch the soil and add organic amendment and apply chemical fertilizer
relevant_recom_tip_4: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods

relevant_recom_tip_5: Register for SMS shade tree distribution for your district

recom_row_2: Prune cocoa trees to have one stem and 3-4 branches. Remove apex branches to reduce tree height
recom_tip_sum_val_2: Pruning should be done on a regualar basis to control canopy and cost.Use family labour to reduce cost
recom_row_3: If the pests and diseases can be observed on more than 60 trees per acre, please apply recommended chemicals. If the pests and diseases observed is on less than 60 trees per acre, please use recommended intensification of cultural practices on the farm (t
recom_tip_sum_val_3: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
recom_row_4: Spread non-diseased cocoa husks evenly on the farm to mulch the soil and add organic amendment and apply chemical fertilizer
recom_tip_sum_val_4: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
recom_row_5: Weed the farm thoroughly. Weeds on the farm should not be above 30-45 cm.
criteria_sum_val_5: Has the farm been weeded well?
recom_tip_sum_val_5: Use family labour if possible to reduce cost
recom_row_6: Pods should be harvested at the right intervals to avoid pods being over ripe
recom_tip_sum_val_6: No additional tip
recom_row_7: Plant recommended shade trees to provide shade to cocoa farm
recom_tip_sum_val_7: Register for SMS shade tree distribution for your district
recom_row_8: For all undesired trees cut and replace with suitable varieties
recom_tip_sum_val_8: Register for SMS shade tree distribution for your district

relevant_recom_1: If the tree show signs of decay it should be cut and replaced. If the trees are infested with other pests please control affected trees immediately (for stem borers- block open ways with sticks or other means, control moss with fungicides etc)

relevant_recom_2: Prune cocoa trees to have one stem and 3-4 branches. Remove apex branches to reduce tree height

relevant_recom_2: limination et coupe des arbres pour obtenir une distance moyenne de plantation  partir de l'anne 1
relevant_recom_tip_2: Utilisez la main d'uvre familiale pour rduire le cot
relevant_recom_3: Si l'arbre prsente des signes de pourriture, il doit tre coup et remplac. Si les arbres sont infests par d'autres ravageurs, veuillez contrler immdiatement les arbres affects (pour les foreurs de tige - bloquer les voies ouvertes avec des btons o
relevant_recom_tip_3: Utilisez du sel concentr pour rduire vos cots de contrle des mousses, rduisez la canope pour rduire les infestations de parasites et les cots associs.
relevant_criteria_4: Maladie  virus des pousses gonfles du cacao
relevant_recom_4: Couper, traiter le sol et remplacer tous les arbres
relevant_recom_tip_4: Utilisez la main d'uvre familiale pour rduire le cot
relevant_criteria_5: Taille au cours des 12 derniers mois
relevant_recom_5: Taillez les cacaoyers pour avoir une tige et 3-4 branches. Retirez les branches de l'apex pour rduire la hauteur des arbres
relevant_recom_tip_5: L'lagage doit tre effectu rgulirement pour contrler la canope et les cots, en utilisant la main-d'uvre familiale pour rduire les cots.
relevant_recom_6: Si les ravageurs et les maladies peuvent tre observs sur plus de 60 arbres par acre, veuillez appliquer les produits chimiques recommands. Si les ravageurs et les maladies observs concernent moins de 60 arbres par acre, veuillez utiliser l'intesificat
relevant_recom_tip_6: Effectuer un reprage rgulier dans les exploitations agricoles pour dtecter une infestation prcoce.
relevant_recom_7: Rpartir uniformment sur la plantation pour pailler le sol et ajouter un amendement organique et pandre l'engrais chimique
relevant_recom_tip_7: Effectuer un reprage rgulier dans les exploitations agricoles pour dtecter une infestation prcoce.
relevant_recom_8: A emporter de la ferme
relevant_recom_tip_8: Effectuez rgulirement des reprages dans les exploitations agricoles pour dtecter les infestations prcoces, puis retirez les cabosses infestes de l'exploitation.
relevant_criteria_9: Prvention des coupes d'arbres et de la chute des fleurs pendant la rcolte
relevant_recom_9: Le fermier doit utiliser des coups minimaux pour viter les coupes d'arbres et endommager les cussions et les fleurs qui tombent prmaturment
relevant_recom_10: Les cabosses doivent tre rcoltes aux bons intervalles pour viter que les cabosses ne soient trop dchires ou malades
relevant_recom_tip_10: Pas de pourboire supplmentaire
relevant_recom_11: Plantez des arbres d'ombrage recommands pour fournir de l'ombre  la plantation de cacao

relevant_recom_1: Starting from year 1, replant all trees segmented into 4.
relevant_recom_tip_1: Register for the CHED rehabilitation project to reduce your budget
relevant_recom_2: If the tree show signs of decay it should be cut and replaced. If the trees are infested with other pests please control affected trees immediately (for stem borers- block open ways with sticks or other means, control moss with fungicides etc)
relevant_recom_tip_2: Use consentrated salt to reduce your cost on moss control,reduce canopy to reduce pest infestation and associated cost
relevant_recom_3: Prune cocoa trees to have one stem and 3-4 branches. Remove apex branches to reduce tree height
relevant_recom_tip_3: Pruning should be done on a regualar basis to control canopy and cost.Use family labour to reduce cost
relevant_recom_4: If the pests and diseases can be observed on more than 60 trees per acre, please apply recommended chemicals. If the pests and diseases observed is on less than 60 trees per acre, please use recommended intensification of cultural practices on the farm (t
relevant_recom_tip_4: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_5: Plant recommended shade trees to provide shade to cocoa farm
relevant_recom_tip_5: Register for SMS shade tree distribution for your district
relevant_recom_6: For all undesired trees cut and replace with suitable varieties

relevant_recom_1: Si l'arbre prsente des signes de pourriture, il doit tre coup et remplac. Si les arbres sont infests par d'autres ravageurs, veuillez contrler immdiatement les arbres affects (pour les foreurs de tige - bloquer les voies ouvertes avec des btons o
relevant_recom_tip_1: Utilisez du sel concentr pour rduire vos cots de contrle des mousses, rduisez la canope pour rduire les infestations de parasites et les cots associs.
relevant_criteria_2: Taille au cours des 12 derniers mois
relevant_recom_2: Taillez les cacaoyers pour avoir une tige et 3-4 branches. Retirez les branches de l'apex pour rduire la hauteur des arbres
relevant_recom_tip_2: L'lagage doit tre effectu rgulirement pour contrler la canope et les cots, en utilisant la main-d'uvre familiale pour rduire les cots.
relevant_recom_3: Si les ravageurs et les maladies peuvent tre observs sur plus de 60 arbres par acre, veuillez appliquer les produits chimiques recommands. Si les ravageurs et les maladies observs concernent moins de 60 arbres par acre, veuillez utiliser l'intesificat
relevant_recom_tip_3: Effectuer un reprage rgulier dans les exploitations agricoles pour dtecter une infestation prcoce.
relevant_recom_4: Rpartir uniformment sur la plantation pour pailler le sol et ajouter un amendement organique et pandre l'engrais chimique
relevant_recom_tip_4: Effectuer un reprage rgulier dans les exploitations agricoles pour dtecter une infestation prcoce.
relevant_recom_5: A emporter de la ferme

sum_row5: Si les ravageurs et les maladies peuvent tre observs sur plus de 60 arbres par acre, veuillez appliquer les produits chimiques recommands. Si les ravageurs et les maladies observs concernent moins de 60 arbres par acre, veuillez utiliser l'intesificat
sum_row6: A emporter de la ferme
sum_row7: Dsherber la ferme avec un coutelas tranchant ou utiliser tout quipement ou outil appropri pour dsherber
sum_row8: Dsherber soigneusement la ferme.Les mauvaises herbes  la ferme ne doivent pas dpasser 30-45 cm
sum_row9: Le fermier doit utiliser des coups minimaux pour viter les coupes d'arbres et endommager les cussions et les fleurs qui tombent prmaturment
sum_row10: Les cabosses doivent tre rcoltes aux bons intervalles pour viter que les cabosses ne soient trop dchires ou malades
sum_row11: Plantez des arbres d'ombrage recommands pour fournir de l'ombre  la plantation de cacao
sum_row12: Pour tous les arbres indsirables qui ne sont pas lagus, coups et remplacs par des varits appropries

relevant_recom_1: If the tree show signs of decay it should be cut and replaced. If the trees are infested with other pests please control affected trees immediately (for stem borers- block open ways with sticks or other means, control moss with fungicides etc)
relevant_recom_tip_1: Use consentrated salt to reduce your cost on moss control,reduce canopy to reduce pest infestation and associated cost
relevant_recom_2: Cut down affected trees, treat the soil and replace all trees
relevant_recom_tip_2: Register for the CHED rehabilitation project to reduce your budget
relevant_recom_3: Prune cocoa trees to have one stem and 3-4 branches. Remove apex branches to reduce tree height
relevant_recom_tip_3: Pruning should be done on a regualar basis to control canopy and cost.Use family labour to reduce cost

relevant_recom_tip_4: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_5: Spread non-diseased cocoa husks evenly on the farm to mulch the soil and add organic amendment and apply chemical fertilizer
relevant_recom_tip_5: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_6: Seperate and remove diseased cocoa husk from the farm immediately following anti-disease contamination protocols

relevant_recom_1: Prune cocoa trees to have one stem and 3-4 branches. Remove apex branches to reduce tree height
relevant_recom_tip_1: Pruning should be done on a regualar basis to control canopy and cost.Use family labour to reduce cost
relevant_recom_2: If the pests and diseases can be observed on more than 60 trees per acre, please apply recommended chemicals. If the pests and diseases observed is on less than 60 trees per acre, please use recommended intensification of cultural practices on the farm (t
relevant_recom_tip_2: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_3: Spread non-diseased cocoa husks evenly on the farm to mulch the soil and add organic amendment and apply chemical fertilizer
relevant_recom_tip_3: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_4: Weed the farm with a sharp cutlass or use any appropriate equipment or tool to weed
relevant_recom_tip_4: Use family labour if possible to reduce cost
relevant_criteria_5: Has the farm been weeded well?
relevant_recom_5: Weed the farm thoroughly. Weeds on the farm should not be above 30-45 cm.
relevant_recom_tip_5: Use family labour if possible to reduce cost
relevant_criteria_6: Preventing tree cuts and flower dropping during harvesting
relevant_recom_6: Teach farmer to use minimum strokes to avoid tree cuts, cushion damages and prematurely dropping of inflorescence / flowers
relevant_recom_tip_6: No additional tip
relevant_recom_7: Pods should be harvested at the right intervals to avoid pods being over ripe
relevant_recom_tip_7: No additional tip
relevant_recom_8: Plant recommended shade trees to provide shade to cocoa farm
relevant_recom_tip_8: Register for SMS shade tree distribution for your district

relevant_recom_2: Si l'arbre prsente des signes de pourriture, il doit tre coup et remplac. Si les arbres sont infests par d'autres ravageurs, veuillez contrler immdiatement les arbres affects (pour les foreurs de tige - bloquer les voies ouvertes avec des btons o
relevant_recom_tip_2: Utilisez du sel concentr pour rduire vos cots de contrle des mousses, rduisez la canope pour rduire les infestations de parasites et les cots associs.
relevant_criteria_3: Taille au cours des 12 derniers mois
relevant_recom_3: Taillez les cacaoyers pour avoir une tige et 3-4 branches. Retirez les branches de l'apex pour rduire la hauteur des arbres
relevant_recom_tip_3: L'lagage doit tre effectu rgulirement pour contrler la canope et les cots, en utilisant la main-d'uvre familiale pour rduire les cots.
relevant_recom_4: Si les ravageurs et les maladies peuvent tre observs sur plus de 60 arbres par acre, veuillez appliquer les produits chimiques recommands. Si les ravageurs et les maladies observs concernent moins de 60 arbres par acre, veuillez utiliser l'intesificat
relevant_recom_tip_4: Effectuer un reprage rgulier dans les exploitations agricoles pour dtecter une infestation prcoce.
relevant_recom_5: A emporter de la ferme

relevant_recom_6: Dsherber la ferme avec un coutelas tranchant ou utiliser tout quipement ou outil appropri pour dsherber

relevant_recom_2: If the tree show signs of decay it should be cut and replaced. If the trees are infested with other pests please control affected trees immediately (for stem borers- block open ways with sticks or other means, control moss with fungicides etc)
relevant_recom_tip_2: Use consentrated salt to reduce your cost on moss control,reduce canopy to reduce pest infestation and associated cost
relevant_recom_3: If the pests and diseases can be observed on more than 60 trees per acre, please apply recommended chemicals. If the pests and diseases observed is on less than 60 trees per acre, please use recommended intensification of cultural practices on the farm (t
relevant_recom_tip_3: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_4: Spread non-diseased cocoa husks evenly on the farm to mulch the soil and add organic amendment and apply chemical fertilizer
relevant_recom_tip_4: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_5: Seperate and remove diseased cocoa husk from the farm immediately following anti-disease contamination protocols
relevant_recom_tip_5: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_criteria_6: Preventing tree cuts and flower dropping during harvesting

relevant_recom_tip_6: No additional tip
relevant_recom_7: For all undesired trees cut and replace with suitable varieties

relevant_recom_tip_1: Use farmily labour to reduce cost
relevant_recom_2: If the tree show signs of decay it should be cut and replaced. If the trees are infested with other pests please control affected trees immediately (for stem borers- block open ways with sticks or other means, control moss with fungicides etc)
relevant_recom_tip_2: Use consentrated salt to reduce your cost on moss control,reduce canopy to reduce pest infestation and associated cost
relevant_recom_3: Prune cocoa trees to have one stem and 3-4 branches. Remove apex branches to reduce tree height
relevant_recom_tip_3: Pruning should be done on a regualar basis to control canopy and cost.Use family labour to reduce cost

relevant_recom_tip_4: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_5: Spread non-diseased cocoa husks evenly on the farm to mulch the soil and add organic amendment and apply chemical fertilizer
relevant_recom_tip_5: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_6: Seperate and remove diseased cocoa husk from the farm immediately following anti-disease contamination protocols
relevant_recom_tip_6: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods

relevant_recom_tip_7: Use family labour if possible to reduce cost
relevant_criteria_8: Has the farm been weeded well?
relevant_recom_8: Weed the farm thoroughly. Weeds on the farm should not be above 30-45 cm.
relevant_recom_tip_8: Use family labour if possible to reduce cost

relevant_recom_1: If the tree show signs of decay it should be cut and replaced. If the trees are infested with other pests please control affected trees immediately (for stem borers- block open ways with sticks or other means, control moss with fungicides etc)
relevant_recom_tip_1: Use consentrated salt to reduce your cost on moss control,reduce canopy to reduce pest infestation and associated cost
relevant_recom_2: If the pests and diseases can be observed on more than 60 trees per acre, please apply recommended chemicals. If the pests and diseases observed is on less than 60 trees per acre, please use recommended intensification of cultural practices on the farm (t
relevant_recom_tip_2: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods

sum_row1: If the tree show signs of decay it should be cut and replaced. If the trees are infested with other pests please control affected trees immediately (for stem borers- block open ways with sticks or other means, control moss with fungicides etc)
sum_row2: Prune cocoa trees to have one stem and 3-4 branches. Remove apex branches to reduce tree height
sum_row3: If the pests and diseases can be observed on more than 60 trees per acre, please apply recommended chemicals. If the pests and diseases observed is on less than 60 trees per acre, please use recommended intensification of cultural practices on the farm (t
sum_row4: Spread non-diseased cocoa husks evenly on the farm to mulch the soil and add organic amendment and apply chemical fertilizer
sum_row5: Seperate and remove diseased cocoa husk from the farm immediately following anti-disease contamination protocols
sum_row6: Pods should be harvested at the right intervals to avoid pods being over ripe
sum_row7: Plant recommended shade trees to provide shade to cocoa farm
sum_row8: Make sure shade trees are 12 meters apart from each other

relevant_recom_1: If the tree show signs of decay it should be cut and replaced. If the trees are infested with other pests please control affected trees immediately (for stem borers- block open ways with sticks or other means, control moss with fungicides etc)
relevant_recom_tip_1: Use consentrated salt to reduce your cost on moss control,reduce canopy to reduce pest infestation and associated cost
relevant_recom_2: Prune cocoa trees to have one stem and 3-4 branches. Remove apex branches to reduce tree height
relevant_recom_tip_2: Pruning should be done on a regualar basis to control canopy and cost.Use family labour to reduce cost
relevant_recom_3: If the pests and diseases can be observed on more than 60 trees per acre, please apply recommended chemicals. If the pests and diseases observed is on less than 60 trees per acre, please use recommended intensification of cultural practices on the farm (t
relevant_recom_tip_3: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_4: Spread non-diseased cocoa husks evenly on the farm to mulch the soil and add organic amendment and apply chemical fertilizer
relevant_recom_tip_4: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_5: Seperate and remove diseased cocoa husk from the farm immediately following anti-disease contamination protocols
relevant_recom_tip_5: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_6: Weed the farm with a sharp cutlass or use any appropriate equipment or tool to weed
relevant_recom_tip_6: Use family labour if possible to reduce cost
relevant_criteria_7: Has the farm been weeded well?
relevant_recom_7: Weed the farm thoroughly. Weeds on the farm should not be above 30-45 cm.
relevant_recom_tip_7: Use family labour if possible to reduce cost
relevant_recom_8: Leave tree stalks on the tree to help with regeneration of pods and flowers
relevant_recom_tip_8: No additional tip
relevant_criteria_9: Preventing tree cuts and flower dropping during harvesting
relevant_recom_9: Teach farmer to use minimum strokes to avoid tree cuts, cushion damages and prematurely dropping of inflorescence / flowers
relevant_recom_10: Plant recommended shade trees to provide shade to cocoa farm
relevant_recom_tip_10: Register for SMS shade tree distribution for your district
relevant_recom_11: Make sure shade trees are 12 meters apart from each other
relevant_recom_tip_11: No additional tip

relevant_recom_1: If the tree show signs of decay it should be cut and replaced. If the trees are infested with other pests please control affected trees immediately (for stem borers- block open ways with sticks or other means, control moss with fungicides etc)
relevant_recom_tip_1: Use consentrated salt to reduce your cost on moss control,reduce canopy to reduce pest infestation and associated cost
relevant_recom_2: Prune cocoa trees to have one stem and 3-4 branches. Remove apex branches to reduce tree height
relevant_recom_tip_2: Pruning should be done on a regualar basis to control canopy and cost.Use family labour to reduce cost
relevant_recom_3: If the pests and diseases can be observed on more than 60 trees per acre, please apply recommended chemicals. If the pests and diseases observed is on less than 60 trees per acre, please use recommended intensification of cultural practices on the farm (t
relevant_recom_tip_3: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_4: Spread non-diseased cocoa husks evenly on the farm to mulch the soil and add organic amendment and apply chemical fertilizer
relevant_recom_tip_4: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_5: Seperate and remove diseased cocoa husk from the farm immediately following anti-disease contamination protocols
relevant_recom_tip_5: Conduct regualr farm scouting to spot infestation early.Take out from the farm infested pods
relevant_recom_6: Weed the farm with a sharp cutlass or use any appropriate equipment or tool to weed
relevant_recom_tip_6: Use family labour if possible to reduce cost
relevant_criteria_7: Has the farm been weeded well?
relevant_recom_7: Weed the farm thoroughly. Weeds on the farm should not be above 30-45 cm.
relevant_recom_tip_7: Use family labour if possible to reduce cost
relevant_criteria_8: Preventing tree cuts and flower dropping during harvesting
relevant_recom_8: Teach farmer to use minimum strokes to avoid tree cuts, cushion damages and prematurely dropping of inflorescence / flowers
relevant_recom_tip_8: No additional tip
relevant_recom_9: For all undesired trees cut and replace with suitable varieties
relevant_recom_tip_9: Register for SMS shade tree distribution for your district
